00302   class amoebaFunc;
00303   friend class amoebaFunc;
00304 
00305   class amoebaFunc {
00306     int sign_;
00307     int ncall;
00308     CEfit *ef;
00309   public:
00310     amoebaFunc(CEfit *Ef, int psiSign) { ef = Ef; sign_=psiSign;ncall=0;}
00312     double operator() (const double *x) {
00313       ncall++;
00314       return 1+sign_*ef->cyl2psi(Vector3d(x[0],0,x[1]));
00315     }
00316     int ncalls() {return ncall;}
00317   };
00318   void   amoeba(double **p,double *y,int ndim,double ftol,amoebaFunc &func);
00319   double amotry(double **p,double *y,double *psum,int ndim,int ihi,double fac,double *ptry,amoebaFunc &func);
